description: Scoring anchors for Freedom Index metrics. Include these in buildPrompt() so LLMs understand what 0-100 means for both Legal and Enforcement scores.

pf_01_cannabis_legal.name: Cannabis Legality
pf_01_cannabis_legal.description: Legal status of recreational cannabis use and possession

legalScore.100: Fully legal - recreational sales permitted, licensed dispensaries
legalScore.75: Medical program with broad access, decriminalized recreational
legalScore.50: Medical only (strict program) OR decriminalized possession
legalScore.0: Illegal - felony charges, prison time possible

enforcementScore.100: Never enforced - police ignore cannabis completely
enforcementScore.75: Rarely enforced - low priority, warnings only
enforcementScore.25: Usually enforced - regular arrests and citations
enforcementScore.0: Strictly enforced - zero tolerance, active prosecution

pf_02_alcohol_restrictions.name: Alcohol Purchase Restrictions

legalScore.50: Moderate restrictions - Sunday limits, some venue restrictions
legalScore.25: Heavy restrictions - state-controlled stores, limited hours

enforcementScore.100: Never enforced - sales occur outside legal hours freely
enforcementScore.25: Usually enforced - regular inspections, fines issued
enforcementScore.0: Strictly enforced - immediate penalties, license revocations
